title: Attack on Titan
description: A story of humanity's struggle for survival against giant humanoid creatures.

title: My Hero Academia
description: Follows the story of a boy born without superpowers in a world where they are the norm.

title: One Piece
description: The adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in search of the One Piece treasure.

title: Naruto
description: A young ninja seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

title: Demon Slayer
description: Follows Tanjiro Kamado's journey to become a demon slayer after his family is slaughtered by demons.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
description: The story of two brothers who use alchemy in their quest to find the Philosopher's Stone.

title: Death Note
description: A high school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it.

title: Sword Art Online
description: Players trapped in a virtual reality MMORPG must clear the game to escape, or they will die in real life.

title: Dragon Ball Z
description: Follows the adventures of Goku and his friends as they defend Earth against various villains.

title: Cowboy Bebop
description: Bounty hunters in the year 2071 travel the galaxy in pursuit of dangerous criminals.
